title: OMC Notification 2026 - Apply Offline for 02 Director Posts
description: The Odisha Mining Corporation Limited (OMC) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 02 Director Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech, M.E./M. Tech, Diploma in Civil, Electrical, Mechanical Engineering, MBA, and Post-graduation can apply for the OMC Notification 2026. The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we h...
